title: How metal/support interaction improved degradation performance in the peroxymonosulfate activation process: significance of high-valent cobalt-oxo species
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00355A, Paper
Xing Fan, Wei Zhang, Huchuan Yan, Cui Lai, Dengsheng Ma, Shiyu Liu, Mingming Zhang, Ling Li, Xuerong Zhou, Xiuqin Huo, Fuhang Xu, Xiaorui Hu, Biting Wang, Hao Sun, Wuqiang He
10-CFS exhibited outstanding PMS activation ability, 98.7% of CIP was degraded within 30 min. The result demonstrated that the presence of Co(IV)ÓÄÅO caused the better degradation performance of 10-CFS.
